Evently and The Really Useful Group

Really Useful Group have teamed up with Evently to offer your adult amateur dramatic society a professional solution for managing your ticket sales and getting the word out about your production.

Find out more

Evently have a long background in pioneering event products and are working with Really Useful Group, which exists to bring the work of Andrew Lloyd Webber to the world, to help increase box office sales and efficiency for your productions.

Event pages for online ticket sales

Give us the details about your upcoming productions and weâ€™ll build you dedicated event pages to handle all ticket sales. These pages then become the center of your marketing for your events.

Tell the world with a single click

With your event page created, you can instantly publish your event to two dozen relevant event websites, on social media and on your own unique interactive event page.

Get your event discovered

Manage your local audience easily and increase your reach when discovered by a completely new audience online.

Manage your ticket sales

A hassle-free ticketing platform where you can track all of your sales in one place.

Your data is safe.

All customer data is automatically recorded, and everything is secure, so you have everything you need to make your next wave of shows a success.
